name: Windows Directory Query File
summary: Learn about .QDS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QDS files are used for reopening searches, as well as sharing Active Directory searches with other users.
NOTE: Windows 7 uses .SEARCH-MS files to save local Windows Explorer searches.

description: Saved search file created in Microsoft Windows' "My Network Places;" contains the search criteria and scope information for searching folders and files in Active Directory, a centralized permissions management program.
